attr.title: Dungeon Antiqua
attr.desc: Dungeon Antiqua is a simple RPG inspired by the Wizardry and Final Fantasy games of the 1980s and 1990s, in which players traverse dungeons by repeatedly exploring and developing their characters.
attr.desc_md: Dungeon Antiqua is a simple RPG inspired by the Wizardry and Final Fantasy games of the 1980s and 1990s, in which players traverse dungeons by repeatedly exploring and developing their characters.
attr.inst: Buy the game on https://store.steampowered.com/app/3198540/Dungeon_Antiqua/ , install it and copy dungeon-antiqua.pyxapp in the dungeonantiqua/gamedata directory.
attr.inst_md: Buy the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3198540/Dungeon_Antiqua/), install it and copy `dungeon-antiqua.pyxapp` in the `dungeonantiqua/gamedata` directory.
